### Chain-of-Verification: Reducing Hallucinations in Large Language Models
- **arXiv ID:** 2601.04892
- **Authors:** Sarah Chen, Michael Liu, David Park
- **Link:** https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.04892
- **Published:** 2026-01-07
- **Categories:** cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG
- **Relevance:** 0.89 | **Novelty:** 0.58
- **Why read:** Directly addresses LLM hallucination reduction - a core challenge in your research area. The 47% reduction in factual errors is a significant result.
- **Added:** 2026-01-08

### Retrieval-Augmented Reasoning: Combining External Knowledge with Chain-of-Thought
- **arXiv ID:** 2601.04234
- **Authors:** James Anderson, Maria Garcia, Tom Wilson

- **Published:** 2026-01-07
- **Categories:** cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI
